title: #370 TopChef/RHOA: Zodiac Killer
description:
Not one, but two surprising eliminations on "Top Chef: Charleston" this week, and we're here to help pick up the pieces. Then it's on to "Real Housewives of Atlanta" where Kenya may be due for some broken window policing. But first, we check in on Bravo's new show, "The First Family of Hip-Hop."

00:04:37 - First Family of Hip Hop
00:20:53 - Top Chef: Charleston
01:00:54 - Real Housewives of Atlanta

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.

Our Patreon Extras: https://patreon.com/watchwhatcrappens
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (Ben Mandelker & Ronnie Karam)
